act_info.full_title: Major-General Sir Isaac Brock Day Act, 2012, S.O. 2012, c. 2
act_info.citation: Major-General Sir Isaac Brock Day Act, 2012, S.O. 2012, c. 2

content.content: 1. October 13 in each year is proclaimed as Major-General Sir Isaac Brock Day.  2012, c. 2, s. 1. 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).  2012, c. 2, s. 2. 3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).  2012, c. 2, s. 3. ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1. October 13 in each year is proclaimed as Major-General Sir Isaac Brock Day.  2012, c. 2, s. 1.

2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).  2012, c. 2, s. 2.

3. Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).  2012, c. 2, s. 3.

______________

 

Français
